text: Raymond Narville Russell (born May 1, 1940) is a retired American light- heavyweight boxer. He won a gold medal at the 1971 Pan American Games and competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Cincinnati Category:Boxers from Ohio Category:Boxers at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic boxers of the United States Category:American male boxers Category:Boxers at the 1971 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in boxing Category:Pan American Games gold medalists for the United States Category:Light-heavyweight boxers
title: Raymond Russell (boxer)
